"

img_summary: The image is a screenshot from a video game interface, displaying a character in the "Equipment" menu. The character is muscular, with grayish skin, and is holding a large sword. The character is adorned with a cloth garment and has a belt with intricate designs. The interface includes options such as "Self-Advance," "Relics," "Inventory," "Journal," and "Settings." The top right corner shows numerical values, possibly indicating in-game currency or points, with the numbers 46245 and 5. The bottom of the screen provides options to "Exit Examine" and "Return."
